title: Korean Class (Non­Credit Course)registration period ： by March 15
content:
KAIST Language Center is offering Korean classes for the foreign KAIST students (including exchange students), faculty, postdoctoral, and their family at KAIST.

Registration 
 - Term: 2007 Spring Semester
 - Registration Period: by March 15 
 - Classes
Class           Time                   Days               Open for
Beginner /7:00 to 8:30 pm / Mon. & Wed.        1. KAIST Faculty, Students,     
                                                                   Postdoctoral, and their Family
                                                                2. Non-KAIST people
Intermediate /7:00 to 8:30 pm/Mon. & Wed.        


- How to register a class
   1. Go to the Language Center homepage    
       (http://lang.kaist.ac.kr/english/enrollment.asp)
   2. Click “Join” to create your ID (if you have your own ID already, go to #3)
   3. Log in with your ID and PW
   4. Click “Study Programs” and register class you want

Professor, Period, and Classroom
   - Professor: Dr. Palnam Kim
  - Period: March 19 to May 25, 2007 (No class Apr. 16 to 20 for Mid-term, 
              May 1, and 24)
   - Classroom: 1408 (N4, 4th floor)

Placement Test
   - Date and time: March 16 (Fri.) 7 to 9 pm
   - Place: Room # 1408
   - The class and time will be adjusted by the placement test results
 
Tuition
Class            Time                                               Tuition
Beginner /7:00 to 8:30 pm / Free for KAIST Faculty, Students, Postdoctoral, 
                                       and Their Family 
                                       116,000 won for Non-KAIST people
Intermediate /8:30 to 10:00 pm /Free for KAIST Faculty, Students,
                                             Postdoctoral, and Their Family
                                             116,000 won for Non-KAIST people 

* Account number for tuition payment: 
              Woori Bank 270-003359-13-046, holder's name: 한국과학기술원

 Contact
 Please feel free to call Jongseok Lee at 869-8736 for more information.
 Email: jongseok@kaist.ac.kr          http://lang.kaist.ac.kr/english
